  • Creating and editing structured content
  • View page source

Creating and editing structured content¶

Structured legal content needs to be created in a specific way as certain content types depend on other content types.

  • Legal problems:

    • require a solution, which must be created first. A legal problem cannot be saved without a valid solution.

    • allow for frequently asked questions, which must be created first and attached.

  • Solutions have optional components that must exist to be attached to a legal solution. These are:

    • Legal form

    • Legal how-to

    • Helpful organization

  • Legal how-tos require Legal steps, which must be created first.

There are 7 structured content types:

  • Creating DIY Legal Solution
    • Provide a title and subtype
    • Provide descriptions
    • Draft introduction
    • Tag the DIY Legal Solution to specific taxonomies
    • Include possible solutions and prevention options
    • Link to frequently asked questions
    • Link to related content
    • Add additional metadata
  • Creating a Legal Option
    • Create the core solution information
    • Categorize the solution
    • Add legal difficulty
    • Define eligibility rules
    • Define the result
    • Build out additional related components
    • Complete the Legal Option legal metadata
    • Add additional metadata
  • Organizing legal steps into a How-to
    • Create the core how-to information
    • Categorize the How-to
    • Define how long the process takes
    • Define the steps in the process
    • Add additional metadata if needed
    • Style notes
  • Creating Legal Step
    • Style notes
    • Legal forms needed
    • Jurisdiction
    • Creating or editing a step
    • Add editorial metadata
  • Restructuing Easy forms and blank forms for use in steps
    • Relationship to Easy Forms
    • Relationship to Statewide fillable PDFs
    • Creating and editing a legal form
    • Full add/edit form
  • Creating a Legal Question
    • Add Question and Description
    • Categorize the legal problem
    • Draft the answer or answers
    • Tag related content
    • Add Content Management Metadata
  • Structured Helpful Organization
    • What is a helpful organization?
    • Creating a helpful organization
    • Full add/edit form
    • Automatic Helpful Organization Creation
  • Managing structured content FAQs

They often rely on:

  • Paired Markup
  • Coverage area
    • Jurisdiction and Negate Jurisdiction
  • Structured Text & Lists
    • Paired markup section
    • List segments section
